name: PUEBLO OF OHKAY OWINGEH
description: Federally recognized tribe of Native American Pueblo people.
sampleDescriptions: Resolution of the Pueblos water rights claims through a negotiated settlement agreement.  We anticipate such a settlement will involve an authorization from Congress.  There is no draft legislation as
